mapper.select: SELECT family_floor.id, family_floor.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM family_room WHERE family_room.floor_id = family_floor.id) AS roomCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM device_device INNER JOIN family_room ON device_device.room_id = family_room.id INNER JOIN family_floor ON family_floor.id = family_room.floor_id AND family_floor.id = family_floor.id WHERE device_device.room_id = family_room.id) AS deviceCount FROM family_floor

SELECT family_floor.id, family_floor.`name`, family_floor.create_time, family_floor.update_time, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM family_room WHERE family_floor.id = family_room.floor_id) AS roomCount, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM device_device INNER JOIN family_room AS r ON device_device.room_id = r.id WHERE family_floor.id = r.floor_id ) AS deviceCount FROM family_floor AS family_floor WHERE 1 = 1 and family_floor.family_id=#{familyId}
and family_floor.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{floorName},'%')
